[以]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) – a person ( 人 ) carrying something. It is often simplified to 㠯 in pre- Qin ancient scripts. Today, the person is partly visible on the right (see also the stylization in 从 ).
See also 重 , in which a person is carrying a bag, 央 , in which a person is carrying a pole, and 年 , in which a person is carrying the harvest.

[似]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *ljɯʔ ): semantic 亻 ( “ human ” ) + phonetic 以 ( OC *lɯʔ ) .
